item.title: Junichi Masuda's Mii appearing in StreetPass Mii Plaza: To promote Pokémon Gold, Silver
item.description: To celebrate the launch of Pokémon Gold and Silver on the Nintendo 3DS Virtual Console, Junichi Masuda's Mii is now appearing as a special guest in the StreetPass Mii Plaza in Europe and Australia.
item.author: Escparth

item.title: Marshadow codes to be available from Amazon.es: To be sent out October 2
item.description: Customers who preorder Pokémon Ultra Sun or Ultra Moon from Amazon.es will receive a serial code to obtain Marshadow.
item.author: Escparth

item.title: Shiny Mimikyu to be available in South Korea: To be available Oct. 7 and 8
item.description: A Shiny Mimikyu will be distributed for Pokémon Sun and Moon at the Autumn Korean League in South Korea, which will be held from October 7 to 8, 2017 at the Lotte Department Store Cheongnyangni Branch.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: Nintendo Switch to be released in South Korea, Taiwan: To be released Dec. 1
item.description: The Nintendo Switch will be released in South Korea and Taiwan on Dec. 1, 2017.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: Ultra Sun, Ultra Moon trailer shows off Mantine Surf, more: Over 400 Pokémon will appear in Alola
item.description: A new trailer for Pokémon Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon has revealed various details about the game. The trailer shows off the new Poké Ride Mantine Surf, among other features.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: Pokémon Playhouse app available for iOS, Android, Kindle Fire: Aimed at children ages 3-5
item.description: A new Pokémon app for iOS, Android, and Kindle Fire has been released. The Pokémon Playhouse app is aimed at children aged 3 to 5 years old.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: Pokémon GO to have Equinox event: To run Sept. 22 to Oct. 2
item.description: To celebrate the equinox, Pokémon GO will be running a special in-game event from Sept. 22 to Oct. 2, 2017.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: Pokémon GO update adds new search key terms: Global Goals shirt available for free
item.description: A new update for Pokémon GO that brings the game to version 0.75.0 (labeled 1.45.0 on the iOS App Store) is currently being rolled out. Additionally, a Global Goals shirt is now available for free in the game.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: Mallow's Steenee available via common code for Korean games: Available for Pokémon Sun, Moon
item.description: Mallow's Steenee is available for Korean region Pokémon Sun and Moon using the common serial code ALOLASTEW762.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: Locations, times announced for twentieth movie international screening: Canadian showings to be ...
item.description: Locations and times of showings of Pokémon the Movie: I Choose You! have been added to the Fathom Animation website.
item.author: Abcboy

item.title: Marshadow codes to be available in Belgium, Netherlands: To be available at annual events
item.description: Codes to obtain Marshadow will be available at events to be held in the Netherlands and Belgium in October this year.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: White + Orange New Nintendo 2DS XL to be released in North America: To be released October 6
item.description: Nintendo of America has announced that White + Orange edition of the New Nintendo 2DS XL will be released in North America on October 6, 2017.
item.author: Escparth

item.title: Meowth available at Build-a-Bear Workshop: Comes with Meowth TCG card
item.description: Meowth plushes are now available at Build-a-Bear Workshop. The Meowth plush comes with a Meowth Quickball Hoodie, Meowth Team Rocket Hoodie, 6-in-1 Meowth sound, and a Meowth Pokémon Trading Card Game card.
item.author: Escparth

item.title: Charizard codes to be available at Target in North America: To be available October 1
item.description: Codes to obtain Charizard in Pokémon Sun and Moon will be available at Target stores in North America from October 1 to 14, 2017.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: Pokémon: Indigo League Gets October UK DVD/BD Release: First UK home video release for TV ...
item.description: UK based distributor confirms DVD and Blu-ray release of "Pokémon: Indigo League", marking the first home video release since the VHS era.
item.author: Ryu Shoji

item.title: Shiny Silvally codes to be available in Japan, South Korea, Hong Kong, Taiwan: Will hold Gold ...
item.description: Serial codes to obtain Shiny Silvally in Pokémon Sun and Moon will be available in Japan, South Korea, and Hong Kong and Taiwan.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: Pokémon Ultra Sun, Ultra Moon Double Pack to be available in Japan, South Korea: Pre-order ...
item.description: The Pokémon Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon Double Pack will be released in Japan and South Korea at the games' launch on November on November 17, 2017. It includes both games.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: Celebi to be available with purchase of Virtual Console Pokémon Gold, Silver: 3DS themes also ...
item.description: Bonuses with the purchase of Pokémon Gold and Silver for Virtual Console have been revealed.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: Pokémon-themed New Nintendo 2DS XL to be released: Poké Ball Edition, Pikachu Edition to be ...
item.description: Two new Pokémon special edition New Nintendo 2DS XL systems have been announced, although one is exclusive to Japan.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: New Ultra Beasts revealed for Ultra Sun, Ultra Moon: English names of Necrozma forms, ...
item.description: Today's Nintendo Direct has revealed new details about Pokémon Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon. Most notably, there are new Ultra Beasts.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster
